content.question: Which of the following is most characteristic of Voltaire's ideas?

choices.label: Empiricism and religious toleration are to be celebrated.
The branches of government should be balanced.
Future progress is inevitable and limitless.
The General Will is the ideal basis for good government.
Sensory experience can never be verified.

content.answer: Empiricism and religious toleration are to be celebrated.
